"Sub Classes":
"The Class Change function of the Class Counter isn't just used for changing your Main Class. You can also set a Sub Class there.

Setting a Sub Class lets you use that Class's weapons. In addition, you will be able to use that Class's Photon Arts, Techniques and some Class Skills, but they will be weaker than when used as a Main Class."

"For instance, if your Main Class is Hunter and your Sub Class is Force, you will be able to equip Rods in addition to your Hunter weapons.

While equipped with a Rod, you will be able to cast Techniques."

"While you have a Sub Class set, that Sub Class will gain EXP equal to a portion of the EXP your Main Class earns.

However, your Sub Class cannot gain EXP if it is within 5 levels of your current level cap."
